items.name: Filo Mortal
items.description: Al participar en una eliminación, otorga 20 de daño de ataque adicional hasta que finalice el combate. Se puede acumular de forma infinita(comenzando en 1).

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Basic Attacks heal the holder for 40% of the damage dealt.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.description: [Unique] After casting a spell, set your mana to 20.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150★ magic damage to all nearby enemies.

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 35 Spell Power for the rest of combat.
